mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (post_id, user_id, nickname, content, created_at, likes, image_urls) VALUES (#{postId}, #{userId}, #{nickname}, #{content}, #{createdAt}, #{likes}, #{imageUrls})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM comment_likes WHERE comment_id = #{commentId} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT id, post_id, user_id, nickname, content, created_at, likes, image_urls FROM comment WHERE post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
